The sequel to one of last yearÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s top games is back! JellyCar 2 comes fully loaded with more than 30 new levels, new power-ups, and three new modes! JellyCar is the hit driving platform game developed by Walaber. The game is about driving a squishy car through squishy worlds to reach the exit.


*****************ALL NEW MODES!*****************

CUSTOM MODE:
_______________

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Create your own puzzles with the Custom Level Editor. Choose ramps, wheels, levers and more from over 40 items.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Customize your JellyCar! Choose from multiple body styles and color combinations. 

JELLY FACTORY:
_______________

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Where does all this squishy goodness come from? The Jelly Factory, of course! In this puzzle game your goal is to guide the falling parts into matching chutes. Tap the levers to open different pathways to guide each part down the conveyor belts.

LONG JUMP:
_______________

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re going for distance, so go for speed! Watch out for objects that can slow you down, and look for objects that can help give you a boost!

*************ALL NEW JELLY ABILITIES!*************

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Sticky Wheels: Activate Sticky Wheels and drive up walls!
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Balloon Ability: Activate Balloon Ability and float out of trouble!


Jelly Car 2 features original music by Matt McCarthy, high score leaderboards and simple touch & tilt controls. With so much squishy goodness, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll want to drive JellyCar 2 all around town!

What's new



Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Controls Issue fixed: Based on complaints of cars not being able to be controlled (forward/backward) after any interrupt.
